root.name: Yu-Gi-Oh!: GX Tag Force
root.description: OverveiwYu-Gi-Oh! GX Tag Force a game developed by Konami based on the popular cartoon series Yu-Gi-Oh! GX. It is the first Yu-Gi-Oh game to be relased on the PSP and the first in the series to feature tag team duels.
